Text: DO NOT DOWNLOAD, unless you want to waste your time.  The file is screwed up, somehow it was encoded and plays back at roughly 1.2x speed.  Unfortunately it can NOT be corrected by re-encoding or adjusting a setting with your media player.  Dropping the speed down to .8 with VLC seems to get it pretty close to the proper speed, but the movement won't be fluid and the voices won't be quite right.  Too bad, the video quality is perfect aside from the FPS problem.  Download another torrent...
